name: Mufid Yousuf
story: Arif Zahor was born and raised in Tehran, Iran. He enlisted in the Iranian military at a young age and quickly rose through the ranks due to his exceptional leadership skills. After serving multiple tours in the Middle East, he was recruited by the OPFOR to serve as a Squad Leader. Arif is known for his tactical prowess and his ability to motivate and inspire his troops. Despite his success in the military, Arif struggles with his personal life, often feeling isolated due to his single status and religious beliefs.
